thread.section_title: Gardner-White Furniture Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Gardner-White Furniture | www.gardner-white.com | 29 of 227
thread.title: Audrey

author: Audrey
title: Audrey
text: I ordered online during a sale. It was a great deal. My husband and I could not pass it up. Everything went smoothly. Ordering online was super easy, fast and especially convenient. Delivery on the other hand was kind of a let down. I was given a two hour window. They did not show up in that time frame, but an hour and a half later. I understand, things happen.. but we sat around waiting and ended up canceling our later plans so we could receive our mattress when it arrived. It would have been nice to get a phone call letting us know of a delay.. or anything. We got nothing. It's ok though, our new mattress is wonderful and we are satisfied.
